name: Idaho Johnson and the Desert's Curse
name_original: Idaho Johnson and the Desert's Curse
description:
Are you brave enough to cross these Egyptian sands? Well, you’re gonna have to be! The daring crusader Idaho Johnson as discovers a strange curse in the arid desert. It seems that the dead are walking again! Help Idaho collect the three Gemstones of Life to open the secret throne room inside the pyramid, where the Gem of Gems awaits with the power to put an end to this curse. Follow him through scorching sands, dark temples, and eerie caves as he uses his trusty revolver and pure ingenuity to blast his way through the undead and put an end to this wretched curse! Who knows what awaits beneath these mysterious sands?

This project was made using Unity in my Multimedia and Game Design class.
